headline: Sieve (YC W22) Is Building AI Infrastructure for Video
description:
Our website: https://www.sievedata.com/

Hey HN! I'm one of the founders of a startup called Sieve, and at a high level we're building ML infrastructure focused on video data. Think about it as something similar to Databricks or what Tesla's ML data engine looks like internally, but focused on video and built for software engineers and data scientists who may not know the ins and outs of deep learning and infrastructure. We're a team of recent Cal grads with experience at many ML companies (Scale AI, NVIDIA, Niantic, Microsoft) and within a year, have multiple large paying customers.

Video is becoming a huge thing with apps like TikTok and Zoom taking over, and smart cameras being installed everywhere from homes, to farms, fleets, warehouses, retail stores, and more. We think we have the potential to position ourselves as the company that brings ML infrastructure to the masses of software companies just getting started on their journeys.

We're currently building out our founding team.
